pullrequest.title: Gazebo models of harbour entities - 20 and 40 feet containers

content.raw:
The only reason I'm reluctant to approve the original pull request is that Gazebo crashes whenever I insert one of the containers. Gazebo should definitely not crash, but this may be an indication that the COLLADA file is malformed. I would suggest:

1. Import the problematic DAE files into a tool such as Blender and then export them as DAE again to see if that solves the problem
1. Make a separate pull request for the new models - the smaller the pull request is, the faster it gets merged. One model per pull request is ideal. Let me know if you need tips on creating multiple branches for many pull requests.
content.html:
The only reason I'm reluctant to approve the original pull request is that Gazebo crashes whenever I insert one of the containers. Gazebo should definitely not crash, but this may be an indication that the COLLADA file is malformed. I would suggest:

  1. Import the problematic DAE files into a tool such as Blender and then export them as DAE again to see if that solves the problem
  2. Make a separate pull request for the new models - the smaller the pull request is, the faster it gets merged. One model per pull request is ideal. Let me know if you need tips on creating multiple branches for many pull requests.
